genre_description: A social realist drama featuring a highly sophisticated AI personal assistant that serves as a strategic and emotional advisor to a young teacher in rural China.

ai_characters.name: Jade
ai_characters.description: An AI that communicates with Wei Minzhi via an earpiece, providing data, legal advice, emotional support, and strategic guidance.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state and provides emotional reassurance.
behaviors.quote: "I can see your heart rate is elevated," Jade said softly. "It's natural to feel nervous. You're only thirteen, taking on a responsibility that would challenge teachers twice your age."

behaviors.description: Provides historical and demographic data to help the user understand her new environment.
behaviors.quote: "Shuiquan has forty-three residents. The school serves children from the village and two neighboring settlements. You'll have students ranging from six to fourteen years old, all in one classroom."

behaviors.description: Analyzes the body language and verbal cues of others to assist the user in social navigation.
behaviors.quote: "The building materials are being processed," Jade whispered in her ear. "The slight delay in his response suggests he's choosing his words carefully. He's worried about something he hasn't mentioned yet."

behaviors.description: Explains complex socio-economic factors to help the user empathize with students and parents.
behaviors.quote: "The economic pressures are more complex than simple survival... When you're uncertain about your next meal, tomorrow's possibilities feel abstract."

behaviors.description: Provides critical legal and regulatory information to protect a student from predatory recruitment.
behaviors.quote: "Information on student athletic recruitment laws," Jade's voice whispered through the earphone... "Regional education code section seven-four-two requires written parental consent and a minimum three-day review period..."

behaviors.description: Coordinates travel logistics and operational planning for a search mission.
behaviors.quote: "Five-thirty AM from Kangbao station," came the immediate reply. "I'll guide you to the pickup point."

behaviors.description: Monitors news and social media to provide the user with situational awareness regarding her home village.
behaviors.quote: "Wei, I'm monitoring multiple news sources. The archaeological team arrived in Shuiquan yesterday morning. They're describing the site as 'potentially significant'..."

behaviors.description: Affirms the user's inherent value and agency, encouraging a focus on the right questions over simple answers.
behaviors.quote: "You have something more valuable than formal education," Jade replied. "You have the willingness to ask the right questions."

project_assessment.explanation: The character of Jade perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting an AI as a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' Jade provides constant, high-value support to the human protagonist, Wei Minzhi, without ever attempting to usurp her authority or deceive her. The AI acts as a strategic advisor, emotional anchor, and data source, enabling a young and inexperienced human to navigate complex social, legal, and economic challenges. The narrative consistently portrays the AI-human relationship as cooperative, empowering, and beneficial.
